other_tests.findings: Bleeding from the left upper lobe occurred after biopsy forceps were inserted; biopsy was aborted. A bronchoalveolar-lavage specimen disclosed a few acid-fast bacilli.
other_tests.changes_over_time: None identified; cultures were negative for mycobacteria.

other_tests.findings: Yellow fluid containing 2467 white cells per cubic millimeter; glucose level 115 mg per deciliter, total protein level 4.8 g per deciliter.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Cytologic examination showed benign mesothelial cells and no malignant cells.

other_tests.findings: Metastatic transitional-cell carcinoma; no acid-fast bacilli were seen.
Extensive consolidation due to hemorrhage; occlusion of pulmonary arteries with nests of carcinoma.
